titleStmt.title: To the inhabitants of the whole earth, I thus write in the name, and power, and dread of the Lord God.
titleStmt.author: Swinton, John, 1621?-1679.

notesStmt.note: Suggested country of publication from Wing.
Consists of two sermons. First sermon signed: J. Swinton; second sermon signed: J. S.
A plea to the public to lead Christian lives.
Imperfect: tightly bound, torn with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
